typeDescription.name: xiangl2.infosystem.basic.TextAnnotationBase
typeDescription.description: Base type for text annotation. It contains a feature source which shows where this annotation was orriginally made by, and a feature confidence which indicates how confidence it was.

featureDescription.name: source
featureDescription.description: Name of the annotator which orriginally made this annotation.

featureDescription.name: confidence
featureDescription.description: Confidence of this annotation.

typeDescription.name: xiangl2.infosystem.content.Token
typeDescription.description: This class stores the annotation for an token in the input file.

typeDescription.name: xiangl2.infosystem.content.Ngram
typeDescription.description: This class defines basic features and methods for an N-gram sequance annotation. It contains a feature tokenNumber which shows number of tokens in this sequence.

featureDescription.name: tokenNumber
featureDescription.description: Number of tokens in this N-gram sequence.

typeDescription.name: xiangl2.infosystem.content.Gram1
typeDescription.description: This class stores an 1-gram sequence in the input file. It contains a feature which indicates the only token in this sequence.

featureDescription.name: token1
featureDescription.description: The token in this 1-gram sequence.

typeDescription.name: xiangl2.infosystem.content.Gram2
typeDescription.description: This class stores an 2-gram sequence in the input file. It contains features which indicate the two tokens in this sequence.

featureDescription.name: token1
featureDescription.description: The first token in this 2-gram sequence.

featureDescription.name: token2
featureDescription.description: The second token in this 2-gram sequence.

typeDescription.name: xiangl2.infosystem.content.Gram3
typeDescription.description: This class stores an 3-gram sequence in the input file. It contains features which indicate the three tokens in this sequence.

featureDescription.name: token1
featureDescription.description: The first token in this 3-gram sequence.

featureDescription.name: token2
featureDescription.description: The second token in this 3-gram sequence.

featureDescription.name: token3
featureDescription.description: The third token in this 3-gram sequence.

typeDescription.name: xiangl2.infosystem.content.Sentence
typeDescription.description: This class stores the annotation of a sentence in the input file. It contains features which shows the tokens and N-grams in this sentence.

featureDescription.name: tokenArray
featureDescription.description: Array of tokens in this sentence.

featureDescription.name: gram1Array
featureDescription.description: Array of 1-grams in this sentence.

featureDescription.name: gram2Array
featureDescription.description: Array of 2-grams in this sentence.

featureDescription.name: gram3Array
featureDescription.description: Array of 3-grams in this sentence.

typeDescription.name: xiangl2.infosystem.input.Question
typeDescription.description: This class stores the annotation for the question in the input file. It contains a feature content which annotates the question sentence.

featureDescription.name: content
featureDescription.description: The content of this question.

typeDescription.name: xiangl2.infosystem.input.Answer
typeDescription.description: This class stores the annotation for an answer in the input file. It contains a feature content which annotates the answer sentence, and a feature isCorrect to show if this answer is correct.

featureDescription.name: isCorrect
featureDescription.description: Indicate if this answer is correct.

featureDescription.name: content
featureDescription.description: The content of this answer.

typeDescription.name: xiangl2.infosystem.output.AnswerScore
typeDescription.description: This class records the score of an answer.

featureDescription.name: answer
featureDescription.description: An input answer.

featureDescription.name: score
featureDescription.description: Score of the answer in this class.

typeDescription.name: xiangl2.infosystem.output.Result
typeDescription.description: This class stores the answer given by the system and its precision.

featureDescription.name: answer
featureDescription.description: Answers of the question given by the system.

featureDescription.name: answerNumber
featureDescription.description: Number of answers given by the system.

featureDescription.name: correctNumber
featureDescription.description: Number of correct answers given by the system.

featureDescription.name: precision
featureDescription.description: The precision of the result, which is calculated by fomula correctNumber/answerNumber.
